sub_title: Knowledge transfer lead P2P at Weatherford on behalf of Tata Consultancy Services
summary: Mechanical Engineer, 12.5+ Years of work experience in Production Planning & Supply chain including Forecasting, Raw Material Planning, Material Master Data, Detailed Planning, Strategic Planning, ERP implementation (SAP ECC), Supply Chain Optimization, Regulatory  Compliance from Supply chain perspective, etc. and experienced with ERP platforms like SAP R/2, SAP R/3(ECC), BAAN & JD Edwards.

projects.title: ERP Implementation (Project NEA)
projects.description:
* Material Master Data Cleanup.
* Master Data Improvement (Planning Relevant).
* ATP Review & Testing.
* MRP Design for respective portfolio.
* Testing for Migration & Implementation of new ERP System.
* Business Continuity Plan during Start up of ECC 7.1
* Hypercare Until Business as Usual.

contributors.headline: Knowledge transfer lead P2P at Weatherford on behalf of Tata Consultancy Services

profile_positions.description:
Current Role: Knowledge Transfer Lead
Job Responsibilities
- Due Diligence for current process followed by Weatherford in Procure to Pay.
- Understanding and preparing the process flow maps, SOP's.
- Transition and training the team members in Weatherford Service Center(TCS) on P2P process.
- Ensuring the ramp up and go live.
profile_positions.title: Knowledge Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Roles & associated Job Responsibilities
-      Business Supply Chain Planner for Epoxy Europe.
•	Supporting Scheduling team with Troubleshooting of ERP System/SAP related issues.
•	Support Data Validation for FUSION Project, Switching to new ERP system.
•	Preparing Supply demand balances & Support scheduling Team.
•	Supply Chain focal Point on various Improvement Projects

-      Sampling Focal Point
•	Supply Chain focal point in setting up third party sample provider at SGS.
•	Focal Point for third party sample management team (SGS).
•	Focal Point for customer service.
•	Review grades on promote and keep with commercial on regular basis.
•	Supply Chain focal point for introducing new Portfolio/Grades at third Party sample provider (SGS).
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Planner

profile_positions.description:
Roles & associated Job Responsibilities
-      Business Supply Chain Planner for Epoxy Europe.
•	Preparing Supply demand balances & Support Scheduling Team.
•	Working on Optimizing Planning for various Manufacturing sites, Currently Baltringen and Pisticci.
•	Supply Chain focal Point on various Improvement Projects
•	Work on various Supply reliability performances , EHS  & Strategic projects in order to optimize cost

-	Supply Chain Planner for Allyl/EPI & Glycerine (June 2011 till June 2014)
•	Prepare Supply Demand Balance
•	Provide Yearly, Quarterly and Monthly inputs to Chlorine/Site Integration Stade.

-	Detailed Production Scheduler for Rheinmuenster Epoxy (Oct 2009 till Jan 2013)
•	Worked as a link between Demand Management and Master Production Scheduling
•	Responsible for Production Planning by monitoring finished goods considering Capacity Planning parameters.
•	Monitor and track slow moving & blocked inventories.
•	Provide Weekly updates to Business.
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Planner

profile_positions.description:
Roles & associated Job Responsibilities
- Detailed Production Scheduler
•	Worked as a link between Demand Management and MPS.
•	Responsible for Production Planning by monitoring finished goods considering Capacity Planning parameters.
•	Monitor and track slow moving & blocked inventories.
•	Provide Weekly updates to Business.

- Raw Material Scheduler 
•	Ensure timely availability of raw materials and packaging materials at the production site.
•	Coordination with the External & Internal Supplier to ensure timely delivery of material.
•	Work with Purchasing and ensure parameters are properly setup in System

- Contract Manufacturing Planner
•	Responsible for externally producing and managing inventories on behalf of Dow Chemicals.

- Replenishment Scheduler
•	Replenishment of Goods from manufacturing location to destination locations by following established replenishment planning processes.
•	Continuously identified and addressed distribution issues to prevent supply disruptions to customers.
•	Weekly & Monthly updates to EMEA and Global team.
•	Replenishment by Deep Sea Vessels from manufacturing location to EMEA.
•	EMEA Focal Point for sharing weekly update to Global Planner.
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Planner

profile_positions.description:
-	Managing Daily Production Activity and trouble Shooting
-	Planning for Raw Material Replenishment in Co-ordination with Purchasing
-	Design of Jigs/Fixtures and various tools
-	Carry out Maintenance for various machines in regular interval
profile_positions.title: Production Engineer
